__e: We are more than just flesh and blood, more than land.
You may not be my flesh and blood, but you're more.
Right here and now... not in flesh and blood;
The fact that you are here in the flesh tells me that my son is still alive.
Well, actually, I'm clothed now, so you'll have to get to know me a little bit better before you see me in the flesh.
I am flesh and blood and bone, and this is a really big night for me, and I needed you to be here.
Get him some meat and he'll be your friend forever.
You may not be my flesh and blood, but you're more.
Thanks, but I don't eat meat.
Maybe a little more pork, but I like the color that you got on it.
What, for your pork, do we have to do?
I don't much like pork either... but it's very good.
And, of course, horse flesh was unobtainable after the first few weeks.
Does it taste like horse meat?
Why not put some horse meat in it?
I do. I want some man meat.
You know that's not real meat, right?
The night is good, the meat is weak.
We're made of flesh and bones, for goodness sake, the flesh is weak.
What kind of meat is this again?
He said the beef's a little tough.
If the meat is as good as I think it is,
Am I just a piece of meat to you?
I'VE GOT TO PICK UP SOME MORE MEAT FOR LUNCH.
No meat for the boss today.
You are nothing but meat to me.
It's chaps like you that are meat for them.
I was little more than meat to him.
Okay, okay, there's plenty of meat for everyone, and none of it's human, okay?
You wanna see flesh... with a god's eyes?
Is it really easier to eat human flesh than to just tell me why we're still here?
I can taste the blood of the people it's going to kill, smell the burning flesh.
I wish it wasn't like this, but the public wants fresh meat and the public is never wrong.
I got fresh meat on this table almost every day, and all the loving a man my age could possibly stand.
